verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Tuesday] , [ARG0: representatives of North Korea] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to pull out of the upcoming summit with Donald Trump] . North Korea balked over concerns about ongoing US – South Korea military maneuvers , US insistence on North Korea surrendering nuclear weapons , ...
